projects.description: This project uses Fetch API to request data from a public API. The project will allow ussers to search through the directory of employees. If an employee is clicked a modal will open with more info on the employee as well as buttons to allow the user to move through each employee

Game created with object oriented programming. The game generates a phrase onto the screen with empty boxes in place of the letters. The user then has to try and guess what the phrase is without running out of lives.
A form that has been made interactive. The form uses regex to validate the users input and if any of the info is entered incorrectly an error is shown
An app that creates pagination links at the bottom of the page based on the amount of students in the list. A search bar was added allowing the user the ability to search through the list.

Using basic JavaScript syntax, variables, loops, conditionals and object literals, I've built this an app that displays a motivational quote when the button is clicked or after a certain amount of time has passed.
